abstract: John Browne will become chairman of the advisory board of the private equity firm Apax Partners when he leaves BP in July.
snippet: John Browne will become chairman of the advisory board of the private equity firm Apax Partners when he leaves BP in July.
lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 14 — John Browne, chief executive of BP, will become chairman of the advisory board of the private equity firm Apax Partners when he leaves the oil company in July.

headline.main: BP’s Chief to Join Apax, a Private Firm
headline.print_headline: BP’s Chief To Join Apax, A Private Firm
